Package com.github.yeetmanlord.zeta_core.api.api_event_hooks.menu

package com.github.yeetmanlord.zeta_core.api.api_event_hooks.menu
Contains all custom events that relate to menus. This can be used to change functionality of certain menus or create an in-game way to interact with custom coded objects like custom shop items or game events
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    HandleMenuClickEvent
    Used to override menu clicks to add custom functionality.
    MenuSetItemsEvent
    This event is used to override how menus set items.
